data.text: Esia nye ŋutega si Mawu ɖe fia Yesaya, Amoz ƒe vi la, tso Babilonia ƒe gbegblẽ ŋuti.
Mitu aflaga ɖe togbɛ ƒuƒlu tame.
Meɖe gbe na nye aʋawɔla, meyɔ nye kalẽtɔwo
Miƒu to anyi,
Wotso anyigba didiwo dzi va,
Mido ɣli, elabena Yehowa ƒe ŋkeke la tu aƒe.
Le esia ta la, asiwo katã aku yigbaa ɖe amewo ŋu,
Vevesese kple nuxaxa alé wo,
Kpɔ ɖa, Yehowa ƒe ŋkeke dziŋɔ la gbɔna.
Ɣletivi hamehame siwo le dziŋgɔli ŋu la magaklẽ o,
Mahe to na xexea me le eƒe nu tovowo wɔwɔ ta,
Mana amegbetɔwo nave wu sika nyuitɔ,
Eya ta mana dziƒowo naʋuʋu kpekpekpe,
Abe sãde aɖe si wonya ɖe nu ene
Woaƒo lãnu ɖe ame sia ame si wolé,
Woatsɔ woƒe vidzĩwo axlã ɖe anyi le wo ŋkume.
Kpɔ ɖa, made adã ta me na Mediatɔwo ɖe wo ŋu;
Woƒe aŋutrɔwo tea ɖekakpuiwo ƒua anyi.
Babilonia, fiaɖuƒewo ƒe nu xɔasi,
Amewo magatso aƒe ɖe afi ma akpɔ gbeɖe o,
Ke gbemelãwo koe atsyɔ
Gbevuwo hã anɔ afi ma,
